long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CoTik - Manage tiktok accounts easily and professionally

* Promoting additional tools
• View and manage products
• View and manage statements
• View and manage shops
• Optimize product search

* Interaction with product - shop - data table
• Sort data
• Filter data
• Search data
• Calculate data totals

* Advanced Features
• Import - Export product information to Excel
• Share products - template with multiple accounts
• View and remove hidden shops
• Bulk create product in system
• Rename product  directly on the table
• View statement for all payout over a specific period
• Display comprehensive information product
• Real-time data updates
• Get information about:
    - E-commerce platform products
    - Woocommerce platform products
Then enter it into the cotik.app system for management
